thread.section_title: Days Inn London Hyde Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small but well located
thread.title_full: Small but well located - Review of Days Inn London Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Brendan M
title: Small but well located
text: The rooms may be small, but it is well located. A brief walk north-west gets you to Paddington Station, while a south-west jaunt brings you to Lancaster Gate, giving you great access to multiple tube lines. If you look forward to a nice walk in the park, Hyde Park is around 5 minutes south. Just a few blocks away are some of the fancier hotels, with prices to match, so for this location, the Days Inn is a bargain. Plenty of food options in the area. There is a little sound in the rooms, but not enough to be disruptive.
